title: Can anyone help with this statistics problem? - Quora

response.answer_text: Why exactly are you asking a question you already know the answer to? But I will humor you, the answer is b) 0.867  and no I did not do the math I simply Googled it.  Business Statistics  Just to think circa 15 years ago I would have to search for an old college book to find the formula and actually take time to figure that one out.
